property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value:
The FBI has reported an event involving an individual to whom you are subscribed: SID: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.subjectIdentifiers.get("SID") UCN: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.UCN #foreach ($rapbackTriggeringEvent in $emailNotification.notificationRequest.triggeringEvents) Event Type: $rapbackTriggeringEvent.triggeringEventCode Event Date: $rapbackTriggeringEvent.triggeringEventDate Event Text: $rapbackTriggeringEvent.triggeringEventText
#end For more information, please run a criminal history background on this individual.

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value:
Booking Name: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personBookingName
Name in $subscribingSystemDescriptor: $emailNotification.subjectName
SID: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.subjectIdentifiers.get("SID")
DATE/TIME OF BOOKING: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.bookingDateTimeDisplay
ARRESTING AGENCY: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.notifyingAgencyName
ARREST CHARGES:
#foreach ($chargeString in $emailNotification.notificationRequest.arrestCharges) $chargeString
#end

Positively identified by fingerprint in demostate.

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.notifyingAgencyName requested a demostate Arrest Tracking Number(ATN) for $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personFullName on $emailNotification.notificationRequest.eventDateTimeDisplay

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value:
An individual for whom you have subscribed to be notified was involved in an incident documented by the following demostate law enforcement agency:
$emailNotification.notificationRequest.notifyingAgencyName
Incident Date/Time: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.incidentDateTimeDisplay
Incident Report #:$emailNotification.notificationRequest.notificationEventIdentifier
Subject Name: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personNotificationSubjectName
Subject date of birth:$emailNotification.notificationRequest.subjectIdentifiers.get("dateOfBirth")
#set ($role = $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personActivityInvolvementText) #if ($role && $role != "") Role: $role
#end #foreach ($offenseString in $emailNotification.notificationRequest.offenseStrings) $offenseString
#end #foreach ($officerNameString in $emailNotification.notificationRequest.officerNames) Officer: $officerNameString
#end To follow up on this incident, please call $emailNotification.notificationRequest.notifyingAgencyName.

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value:
The following individual, to who, you are subscribed, was involved in a vehicle crash. Details outlined below :
Crash Location: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.crashLocation
Crash Date/Time: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.crashDateTimeDisplay

Subject Name: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personNotificationSubjectName
Subject DOB:$emailNotification.notificationRequest.subjectIdentifiers.get("dateOfBirth")
#set ($role = $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personActivityInvolvementText) #if ($role && $role != "") Subject Role: $role
#end
Agency: Maine $emailNotification.notificationRequest.notifyingAgencyName #foreach ($officerNameString in $emailNotification.notificationRequest.officerNames) Officer: $officerNameString
#end Citation #:$emailNotification.notificationRequest.notificationEventIdentifier
If you require more information, please utilize the Federated Query Tool â€“ https://ojbc.maine.gov/ojb-web-portal/portal/index or call Maine State Police

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: Court Disposition Update notification for $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personFirstName $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personLastName with a birth date of $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personBirthDate The notification had an event ID of: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.notificationEventIdentifier

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: Prosecution Decision Update notification for $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personFirstName $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personLastName with a birth date of $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personBirthDate The notification had an event ID of: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.notificationEventIdentifier

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: Offender: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personLastName, $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personFirstName, DOB: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personBirthDate, Sex: $emailNotification.subscriptionSubjectIdentifiers.get("sex"), Race: $emailNotification.subscriptionSubjectIdentifiers.get("race") Compact Case ID: $emailNotification.subscription.agencyCaseNumber was the subject of a warrant entered into the NCIC Wanted Person File by ORI $emailNotification.subscription.ori. Please confirm this warrant before taking action.

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: Offender: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personFirstName $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personLastName, DOB: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personBirthDate, Sex: $emailNotification.subscriptionSubjectIdentifiers.get("sex"), Race: $emailNotification.subscriptionSubjectIdentifiers.get("race") Compact Case ID: $emailNotification.subscription.agencyCaseNumber was the subject of a warrant entered into the Washington state warrant system by ORI $emailNotification.subscription.ori. Please confirm this warrant before taking action.

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: Offender: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personLastName, $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personFirstName, DOB: $emailNotification.notificationRequest.personBirthDate, Sex: $emailNotification.subscriptionSubjectIdentifiers.get("sex"), Race: $emailNotification.subscriptionSubjectIdentifiers.get("race") Compact Case ID: $emailNotification.subscription.agencyCaseNumber was the subject of a law enforcement search on the NCIC system. To determine the purpose of this search please contact $emailNotification.subscription.ori $emailNotification.subscription.agencyName.

property.name: emailBodyTemplate
property.value: An unknown event occurred for [Subject $emailNotification.subjectName]. Contact an administrator.
